text: Lawrence Cohen Walker Jr. (born March 9, 1942) is an American attorney and former politician who served sixteen terms in the Georgia House of Representatives. He was appointed administration floor leader for Governor Joe Frank Harris in 1983 and House Majority Leader in 1986. ==References== ==External links== Category:Georgia (U.S. state) Democrats Category:20th- century American politicians Category:21st-century American politicians Category:People from Perry, Georgia Category:Living people Category:1942 births
title: Larry Walker (politician)
